title: Multiplexer Function
description: This function receives four input values and two boolean selection inputs to determine which input value to output. The selection of input values is based on the boolean values provided. If the first boolean (A1) is true, the function selects between IN2 and IN3 using A0; otherwise, it selects between IN0 and IN1.
name: MUX_R4

output.name: MUX_R4
output.description: The output value selected based on the input and selection parameters.

return_value.description: The selected output value based on the multiplexer logic.
